name: Every 10 Seconds LD51 48 Attempt
description:
First LUDUM DARE jam attempt but I came late to the party and only just got the basic mechanics in without much visuals or gameplay testing and instructional ;/ hope you enjoy trying it..!

Download for Windows only, Unzip folder, inside run the ".exe file" to start the game.

Escape to exit back to Main Menu, Escape to Exit game at main menu.

Controls: ADD Keys: Left and Right

Space Bar: Jump

Using a tight control mechanism :) [like super meat boy]
